import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser' import { level, categoryClass, generateMedia } from './utils' const Card = props => { const { difficulty, tags, prompt, prompt_media, answer_media, answer } = props.data const side = props.side const levelData = level(difficulty) const media = side === 'front' ? prompt_media.map(item => generateMedia(item)) : answer_media.map(item => generateMedia(item)) const categoryClass = getCategoryClass(tags[0] || 'Uncategorized') return (
 {levelData.text}

{side === 'front' ? `Question` : `Answer`}

{ tags && tags.length ? tags.map((tag, i) => (  {tag} )) : null }
{ ReactHtmlParser(prompt) }
{ media }
{/* {/* className="peach-bg-gradient"> */} {/* {/*
) } export default Card;
